br.p: Administration Building hours for the 2019-20 school year begin Mon, Aug 12th as follows: 7:30 – 4:00 pm Mon-Fri and closed 12:00 – 12:30 for lunch.

div.h3: PCSD#1 Welcomes Community Comments for 2019-20 Transportation Manual

div.p: Platte County School District #1 encourages your comments for the 2019-20 Transportation Manual. Please click HERE to view the 2019-20 Transportation Manual. After reviewing the manual, please email your comments to Superintendent Steve Miller at steven.miller@platte1.org.

div.h3: School Improvement Plans submitted to WDE

div.p: At the regular board meeting on Monday, December 16, 2019, the School Improvement Plans for 2019-20 were approved for each of the six Platte County #1 schools. These plans outline the goals and efforts to increase student achievement to meet the Wyoming Accountability in Education Act as set by the legislature. These plans will be submitted for review to the Wyoming Department of Education. Each school will continue to update these plans as a part of our continuous improvement process to help us “Reach the PEAK.” There are many opportunities for staff and community members to be involved in helping us improve. If you are interested, contact a building principal or take advantage of the many opportunities to provide feedback on our efforts. Please click HERE to view the 2019-20 School Improvement Plans.

span.span: On Monday, April 13, 2020, at the virtual board meeting in Wheatland, the District Policy Review Committee presented first reading policies to the Board of Trustees. Please click HERE to view the policies.
